column1: Cognate with Old Turkic 𐰤𐰀 ‎(ne, “what, which”), Karakhanid [script needed] ‎(nē, “what”), Old Uighur [script needed] ‎(ne, “what”), Azeri nə ‎(“what”), Bashkir ни ‎(ni, “what”), Chuvash мӗн ‎(mĕn, “what”), Kazakh не ‎(ne, “what”), Khakas ниме ‎(nime, “what”), Kyrgyz не ‎(ne, “what”), Tatar ни ‎(ni, “what”), Turkmen nǟmä ‎(“what”), Tuvan чүү ‎(čüü, “what”), Uyghur نېمە ‎(nëme, “what”), Uzbek na ‎(“what”), Yakut туох ‎(tuox, “what”).
